meaning: A set of written or printed pages bound together.
translation: Yazılı veya basılı sayfalardan oluşan ciltli eser, kitap.
examples: I borrowed a book from the library.
She is writing her first book.

meaning: A round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish inside.
translation: Kırmızı veya yeşil kabuklu, beyaz etli yuvarlak meyve (elma).
examples: I ate an apple for breakfast.
This apple tastes sweet.

meaning: The capacity to do something.
examples: She has the ability to solve difficult problems.
His ability to speak languages is amazing.

meaning: The number and name of a place where someone lives or works.
translation: Birinin yaşadığı veya çalıştığı yerin numarası ve adı (adres).
examples: Please write your address on the form.
I moved to a new address last month.

meaning: An advantage or profit gained from something.
translation: Bir şeyden elde edilen avantaj veya kazanç.
examples: Exercise has many health benefits.
The new plan will benefit everyone.

meaning: An occupation undertaken for a significant period of a person's life.
translation: Bir kişinin hayatında uzun süre yaptığı meslek veya iş.
examples: She pursued a career in medicine.
He is thinking about changing his career.

meaning: Correct and without any mistakes.
examples: The report was accurate.
She gave an accurate description of the accident.

meaning: Involving a lot of different but related parts.
translation: Birçok farklı ama ilişkili parçayı içeren, karmaşık.
examples: It's a very complex system.
He solved a complex problem.

meaning: To expect something or prepare for it before it happens.
translation: Bir şeyin olmasını beklemek veya ona önceden hazırlanmak.
examples: We anticipate a rise in food prices.
She anticipated all the questions.

meaning: Existing or happening now.
translation: Şu anda var olan veya meydana gelen.
examples: Contemporary art is very popular nowadays.
I enjoy contemporary literature.

meaning: Although.
examples: He tried, albeit without success.
It was a small, albeit important, victory.

meaning: Logical and consistent.
examples: She gave a coherent argument during the debate.
The essay was clear and coherent.

meaning: The second day of the week.
examples: I have a meeting on Monday.
Monday is the start of the workweek.

meaning: The third day of the week.
examples: I have a class every Tuesday.
Tuesday meetings are important.

meaning: The first month of the year.
examples: January is usually cold.
Her birthday is in January.

meaning: The second month of the year.
examples: February has 28 days.
Valentine's Day is in February.

meaning: A period of twelve months.
translation: On iki aylık bir süre, yıl.
examples: This year has been great.
A year consists of 12 months.

meaning: The warmest season of the year.
examples: Summer vacations are fun.
It gets very hot in summer.

meaning: The coldest season of the year.
examples: It snows a lot in winter.
Winter nights are long.

meaning: The day before today.
examples: I saw him yesterday.
Yesterday was sunny.

meaning: The day after today.
examples: Tomorrow is a holiday.
I'll finish it tomorrow.
